Amachi spreads his arms and launches his scales at high velocity at the target. This technique had enough power to burst a [[shadow clone]] and throw [[Naruto]] back quite some distance. In addition, it had a wide enough range to wipe out six shadow clones at once.

[[pt-br:Senbon de Escama]]
